About Trouvaille

We at Trouvaille aim at promoting event/festival tourism.
So go on plan your trip, make new bonds and unfurl the many adventures awaiting for you

Festivals & Events

India is a land of festivals, where people from different religions coexist harmoniously. The wide  variety of festivals celebrated in India is a true manifestation of its rich culture and traditions. While the celebrations happen all over the year, October till January is the time when the country can be seen at its vibrant best. Here is a quick list of the most famous festivals of India.
Diwali
Holi
Dusshera
Navrathri
Durga Puja
Krishna Janmashthmi
Ganesh Chaturthi
Guru purabh
Raksha Bandhan
Eid-ul-Fitr
Christmas
Bihu
Onam
Pongal

UPCOMING FESTIVALS



India is a land of festivals, where people from different religions coexist harmoniously. The wide  variety of festivals celebrated in India is a true manifestation of its rich culture and traditions.

The myriad of important festivals of India boast of the nation’s rich and varied culture and the religious sentiments of the people. So enjoy these festivals and bring your life into a state of exuberance and enthusiasm.
